papers.title: Spam Detection Using Bidirectional Transformers and Machine Learning Classifier Algorithms

research_output.summary: Transformer models have revolutionized various fields by enabling advanced applications such as spam detection, brain tumor diagnosis, time series analysis, fairness in machine learning pipelines, and in-context learning. These models leverage self-attention mechanisms to process sequential data, making them highly effective for tasks requiring understanding of context and patterns in data.

papers.title: A Comprehensive Review on Synergy of Multi-Modal Data and AI Technologies in Medical Diagnosis
AI in medical diagnosis: AI prediction & human judgment
Rams, hounds and white boxes: Investigating human-AI collaboration protocols in medical diagnosis
To engage or not to engage with AI for critical judgments: How professionals deal with opacity when using AI for medical diagnosis
Rethinking Human-AI Collaboration in Complex Medical Decision Making: A Case Study in Sepsis Diagnosis

research_output.summary: Found 5 papers meeting all constraints. Summary: The papers discuss various aspects of AI in medical diagnosis, including the synergy of multi-modal data, human-AI collaboration, and the challenges of opacity in AI systems. They highlight the importance of integrating AI technologies to enhance diagnostic accuracy and improve healthcare outcomes.
